#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define F first
#define S second
using namespace std;
bool p1[1000000];
pair<ll,ll> ds[200009];
int main()
{
    ll i,j;
    for(i=2;i<1000000;i++) p1[i]=1;
    p1[0]=p1[1]=0;
    for(i=2;i<1009;i++){
        if(p1[i]){
            for(j=i*i;j<1000000;j+=i)
                p1[j]=0;
        }
    }
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        ll a,b,n;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
        ll n1=sqrt((double)b)+1;
        for(i=0;i<=b-a;i++) {
            ds[i].S=1;
            ds[i].F=a+i;
        }
        for(i=2;i<=n1;i++)
        {
            if(p1[i]){
                  j=ceil((double)a/(double)i);
                   j=j*i;
                   for(;j<=b;j+=i){
                    ll x=1;
                    ll y=ds[j-a].F;
                    while(y%i==0){
                        y/=i;
                        x++;
                    }
                    ds[j-a].F=y;
                    ds[j-a].S*=x;
                }
            }
        }
        for(i=0;i<=b-a;i++)
            if(ds[i].F!=1)
                ds[i].S*=2;
       /*for(i=0;i<=b-a;i++){
           cout<<(i+a)<<"  div "<<ds[i].S<<endl;
        }*/
        ll c=0;
        for(i=0;i<=b-a;i++)
            if(p1[ds[i].S])
                c++;
        printf("%lld\n",c);
    }
    return 0;
}
